d.f: ￹￺to go through a religious ritual as when cleansing soldiers who have been through war.  There is disagreement in different parts of the tribe as to who goes to malataw -- good people or criminals * hunters * soldiers * or other people involved in killing.￻經戰亂而回之士兵，都經一個宗教的潔淨儀式。在各族中，有不同的掌權神明，為善男信女或犯罪之人，獵人，士兵， 或殺人者有各不同的宗教儀式
